languages.text: "Фабрикатор-Цензор служит не Омниссии, а иной силе... той, чей глашатай... прибыл на Кьяву с заревами восстания... с ложью и скверной на устах... бойся его, ибо это... это..." {n}Слова вылетают изо рта мученика с финальным вздохом. Истратив последние силы на покаяние, мученик замирает в ваших руках — теперь уже навечно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Но Фабрикатор лишь звено в цепи... лишь слуга тому, кто несет ересь на Кьява Гамма... он отправляет рапорты... вниз... в сердце планеты..." {n}Слова вылетают изо рта мученика с его последним дыханием. Истратив последние силы на покаяние, мученик замирает в ваших руках — теперь уже навечно.{/n}

languages.text: "The Fabricator-Censor does not serve the Omnissiah... he obeys a different power... the one whose herald... came to Kiava Gamma at the onset of the insurgency... his mouth spewing lies and corruption... Fear him, for he is... he is..." {n}The words escape the man's mouth along with his last breath. Having spent the last bit of strength on his confession, he goes limp in your arms — forever this time.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Фабрикатор-Цензор служит не Омниссии, а иной силе... той, чей глашатай... прибыл на Кьяву с заревами восстания... с ложью и скверной на устах... бойся его, ибо это... это..." {n}Слова вылетают изо рта мученика с финальным вздохом. Fear him, for he is... he is..." {n}The words escape the man's mouth along with his last breath. Having spent the last bit of strength on his confession, he goes limp in your arms — forever this time.{/n}

languages.text: “铸造审查师并没有侍奉欧姆尼塞亚……他侍奉的是另一种力量……那种力量的使者……在叛乱爆发时来到了基亚瓦伽马星……他的口中喷出了谎言与腐化……要当心他，因为他是……他是……”{n}这个人用最后的力气，说出了这些话。他的忏悔耗尽了他最后的力量。他在你的怀里瘫软下来，这一次，他再也不会动了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Fabricator-Censor does not serve the Omnissiah... he obeys a different power... the one whose herald... came to Kiava Gamma at the onset of the insurgency... his mouth spewing lies and corruption... Fear him, for he is... he is..." {n}The words escape the man's mouth along with his last breath. Having spent the last bit of strength on his confession, he goes limp in your arms — forever this time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “铸造审查师并没有侍奉欧姆尼塞亚……他侍奉的是另一种力量……那种力量的使者……在叛乱爆发时来到了基亚瓦伽马星……他的口中喷出了谎言与腐化……要当心他，因为他是……他是……”{n}这个人用最后的力气，说出了这些话。他的忏悔耗尽了他最后的力量。他在你的怀里瘫软下来，这一次，他再也不会动了。{/n}

languages.text: «El fabricator-censor no sirve al Omnissiah... obedece a un poder diferente... el poder cuyo heraldo... llegó a Kiava Gamma al comienzo de la insurgencia... para escupir sus mentiras y corrupción... Habéis de temerlo, pues él... él es...». {n}Las palabras escapan de la boca del hombre en un último aliento. La confesión se ha llevado sus últimas fuerzas, y la vida abandona su cuerpo entre tus brazos; esta vez, de manera definitiva.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Fabricator-Censor does not serve the Omnissiah... he obeys a different power... the one whose herald... came to Kiava Gamma at the onset of the insurgency... his mouth spewing lies and corruption... Fear him, for he is... he is..." {n}The words escape the man's mouth along with his last breath. Having spent the last bit of strength on his confession, he goes limp in your arms — forever this time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El fabricator-censor no sirve al Omnissiah... obedece a un poder diferente... el poder cuyo heraldo... llegó a Kiava Gamma al comienzo de la insurgencia... para escupir sus mentiras y corrupción... Habéis de temerlo, pues él... él es...». {n}Las palabras escapan de la boca del hombre en un último aliento. La confesión se ha llevado sus últimas fuerzas, y la vida abandona su cuerpo entre tus brazos; esta vez, de manera definitiva.{/n}

languages.text: 「ファブリケーター・センサーは、万機神の従者では、ない…別の権力に、従って…その使者が、彼…反乱が勃発したとき、キアヴァ・ガンマに、やって来た…あの口は嘘と、腐敗を、吐き出す…恐ろしい…奴は、奴は…」{n}その言葉が、最後の呼吸と共に男の口から漏れ出した。男は告白に最後の力を振り絞り、腕の中で力尽きる…今度こそ、永遠に。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Fabricator-Censor does not serve the Omnissiah... he obeys a different power... the one whose herald... came to Kiava Gamma at the onset of the insurgency... his mouth spewing lies and corruption... Fear him, for he is... he is..." {n}The words escape the man's mouth along with his last breath. Having spent the last bit of strength on his confession, he goes limp in your arms — forever this time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ファブリケーター・センサーは、万機神の従者では、ない…別の権力に、従って…その使者が、彼…反乱が勃発したとき、キアヴァ・ガンマに、やって来た…あの口は嘘と、腐敗を、吐き出す…恐ろしい…奴は、奴は…」{n}その言葉が、最後の呼吸と共に男の口から漏れ出した。男は告白に最後の力を振り絞り、腕の中で力尽きる…今度こそ、永遠に。{/n}

languages.text: "Der Fabricator-Zensor dient nicht dem Omnissiah ... er gehorcht einer anderen Macht ... und deren Herold ... kam zu Beginn des Aufstands nach Kiava Gamma ... sein Mund spuckte Lügen und Korruption ... Fürchtet ihn, denn er ist ... er ist ..." {n}Die Worte entgleiten dem Mund des Manns zusammen mit seinem letzten Atemzug. Die Beichte hat seine letzte Kraft verbraucht, er erschlafft in deinen Armen – diesmal für immer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Fabricator-Censor does not serve the Omnissiah... he obeys a different power... the one whose herald... came to Kiava Gamma at the onset of the insurgency... his mouth spewing lies and corruption... Fear him, for he is... he is..." {n}The words escape the man's mouth along with his last breath. Having spent the last bit of strength on his confession, he goes limp in your arms — forever this time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Fabricator-Zensor dient nicht dem Omnissiah ... er gehorcht einer anderen Macht ... und deren Herold ... kam zu Beginn des Aufstands nach Kiava Gamma ... sein Mund spuckte Lügen und Korruption ... Fürchtet ihn, denn er ist ... er ist ..." {n}Die Worte entgleiten dem Mund des Manns zusammen mit seinem letzten Atemzug. Die Beichte hat seine letzte Kraft verbraucht, er erschlafft in deinen Armen – diesmal für immer.{/n}

languages.text: « Le fabricator-censeur ne sert pas l'Omnimessie... il obéit à une tout autre force... celle dont le héraut... est venu sur Kiava Gamma au début de l'insurrection... pour répandre mensonges et corruption... Craignez-le, car il est... il est... » {n}dit-il sans achever sa phrase avant d'expirer. Ayant utilisé ses dernières forces pour se confesser, son corps se relâche dans vos bras... pour la dernière fois.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Fabricator-Censor does not serve the Omnissiah... he obeys a different power... the one whose herald... came to Kiava Gamma at the onset of the insurgency... his mouth spewing lies and corruption... Fear him, for he is... he is..." {n}The words escape the man's mouth along with his last breath. Having spent the last bit of strength on his confession, he goes limp in your arms — forever this time.{/n}

Ayant utilisé ses dernières forces pour se confesser, son corps se relâche dans vos bras... pour la dernière fois.{/n}

languages.text: "Denetçi Fabrikatör, Hermesih'e değil... Farklı bir güce itaat ediyor... İsyanın başlangıcında Kiava Gama'ya gelen... Ağzından yalanlar ve yozlaşma fışkıran haberci... Korkun çünkü o... Çünkü o..." {n}Adam, son nefesiyle cümlesini tamamlayamıyor. Son gücünü de itirafına harcadıktan sonra kollarında hareketsiz kalıyor. Bu seferki hareketsizliği baki...{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Fabricator-Censor does not serve the Omnissiah... he obeys a different power... the one whose herald... came to Kiava Gamma at the onset of the insurgency... his mouth spewing lies and corruption... Fear him, for he is... he is..." {n}The words escape the man's mouth along with his last breath. Having spent the last bit of strength on his confession, he goes limp in your arms — forever this time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Denetçi Fabrikatör, Hermesih'e değil... Farklı bir güce itaat ediyor... İsyanın başlangıcında Kiava Gama'ya gelen haberci... Ağzından yalanlar ve yozlaşma fışkırıyor... Korkun çünkü o... Çünkü o..." {n}Adam, son nefesiyle cümlesini tamamlayamıyor. Son gücünü de itirafına harcadıktan sonra kollarında hareketsiz kalıyor. Bu seferki sonsuza dek sürecek...{/n}
